name: Teleporter Trouble
description:
The world's teleporters have gone haywire and are sucking everybody in!  Stop them the only way you know how... by teleporting!

A short, arcade-style action game about the horrors of teleporters.

Use arrow keys to move, press and hold Space to grab things.  ESC to quit, R to restart, F1 to toggle fullscreen (executable version only).

My first publicly released game.  Made in two days for Mid-Jam 2020 with the theme of teleportation.

Music: Mocha Guitar by Rick Dickert

Tools used: GameMaker Studio 1.4, BFXR, GraphicGgale
